meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 4.2.5 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 4.2.5 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community and provides a couple of features

meta.title: Getting started with new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin
meta.summary: The all new fabric8 Vert.x Maven Plugin allows you to setup, package, run, start, stop and redeploy easily with a very little configuration resulting in a less verbose pom.xml.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.7.0 released!
meta.summary: We are extremely pleased to announce that the Eclipse Vert.x version 3.7.0 has been released.
